law.catch_line: The Commission shall annually publish in the Maryland Register and make available both on request an...
law.text:
The Commission shall annually publish in the Maryland Register and make available both on request and on the Internet:
a list of states with which the Commission has signed agreements under § 17-3A-06 of this subtitle; and
a summary of the terms of each agreement listed under item (i) of this paragraph; and
a list of the states that the Commission has identified under § 17-3A-07 of this subtitle as not offering substantially comparable reciprocal licensure opportunities; and
a description of the additional requirements the Commission determines are necessary for applicants from other states to comply with the requirements of § 17-3A-07 of this subtitle.
